content: **from the website ** chase away chilly weather and add a splash of color and personal style to your outfit with this easy and fun scarf and mitten set **skill level ** easy **pattern # ** lw1522 **materials ** * 5 ounces no 8529 surf * crochet hook 5 5 mm us i-9 * yarn needle **gauge ** 10 sts = 3 in 14 row = 4 in in single_crochet also available at purple kitty yarns website 1 1 http //purplekittyyarns com/scarf-patterns/easy-crochet-accessories
